content.question: In the final sentence of the third paragraph (“The power of place...thrall”), which of the following best describes the effect of removing the words “the vast majority of”?

choices.label: The author’s claim would become logically inconsistent.
The author’s claim would lose its popular appeal.
The author’s claim would be narrowed by its limitation to a smaller group.
The author’s claim would be broadened by the removal of a qualification.

content.answer: The author’s claim would be broadened by the removal of a qualification.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
